method: In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, sliced cucumber, shredded carrots, sliced bell peppers, diced avocado, chickpeas, and toasted almonds.
Toss the salad gently to mix all the ingredients.
Drizzle the vinaigrette dressing over the salad.
Serve immediately and enjoy the Password Salad full of tasty and nutritious ingredients!
